info.name: Golfed Noise By RikR, 69 Chars.
info.description: Made by Rik Riesmeijer, 2024. Quite small, but I maybe not, I'd love to see smaller ones if possible :)..

renderpass.code:
// Golfed Noise By Rik Riesmeijer, 2024 - No rights reserved - license: CC0, enjoy!
void mainImage(out vec4 c, vec2 v) { c = fract(v *= v *= v *= v.y += 33.11).xxxx; }
renderpass.name: Image
